name: Nano
short_description: Open source, green cryptocurrency and peer-to-peer payment system.
description: Open source, green cryptocurrency and peer-to-peer payment system. Nano is a self-hosted application focused on cryptocurrency, blockchain, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Nano on your home server to open source, green cryptocurrency and peer-to-peer payment system without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Nano to manage your cryptocurrency workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
